title: 伊朗真会抄作业：欧洲支援伊朗的消毒液转头就在黑市出售
contents:
歐洲支援伊朗的人道消毒物資， 在黑市出售。。。

Voice says the regime is selling the supplies sent by European countries to #Iran for humanitarian support during its #COVID19 crisis, instead of giving it to Iranians in their time of need. Says he bought this German alcohol-based disinfectant from the black market.
